content.query:
SELECT distinct TOP(101)
[playlist] as 'Playlist'
,[trackName] as 'Track Name'
,[artist] as 'Artist'
,[albumName] as 'Album Name'
,[popularity] as 'Popularity'
,CASE WHEN artist_genre is null then 'no genre' else artist_genre END as Genre
 FROM [spotifyprod].[playlist]
 where [playlist] = 'Discover Weekly'
 order by [popularity] ASC;
